oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Five Minute Attitude Adjustment Hour
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lippart, Al
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: practice tip
attitudes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: If there is one practice tip I can share with you, one idea that has made more of a difference in my veterinary practice than any drug or procedure, it is this: Attitudes influence events in your life, and no one can alter your attitudes without your permission. Good attitudes can actually attract good events. Positive attitudes produce positive experiences. Attitudes come from a state of mind that you can learn to alter and control in just a few minutes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1989; 193-194
